text:
Hey,
I'm trying to investigate large memory usage of some code I'm writing. There is a specific line responsible for a large majority of allocations. I've tried to make it into a minimal example to share it on discourse, but doing so made this line disappear as an offender. Is it bad practice to share an entire project to ask for help on such a question?
Thanks!

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
